utterance.content: Coffee Mug, Eleonora, Sebastiano Vanessa

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: All right, all right, all right, let's play one more time, ok? And remember, if I win you do not move to Paris.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ok! Can't believe I'm risking this again, but you're on! All right Joe, you remember the rules! Heads I win, tails you lose.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Just flip!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Damnit!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: So we thought we'd throw you little going away party around seven.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, that sounds good!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hey, Rach, you're leaving tomorrow, shouldn't you be packing?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: It's all done!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh, yeah, right! And after I took a shower this morning I just threw my towel on the floor! Oh God, it hurts to even joke about it.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I know... Honey, seriously, I did it all. The luggage that I'm taking is in the bedroom, this is Emma's Paris stuff, these are the boxes that I'm having shipped, and that's the sandwich that I made for the plane...

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Ok, so you've done some good work! What about your carry-ons?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, well. Everything that I need is in here and my travel documents are on the counter organized in the order that I will be needing them.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh my God! I have nothing left to teach you!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Where's your passport?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: It should be right next to my plane ticket.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well, it's not.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What? Maybe I put it in here . Oh, oh, it's not in there! Oh, no! I must have packed it in one of these boxes!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Here, let me help you.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Shoot. Oh, I can't believe I did this!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh, wow, can you believe you're like three weeks away?

utterance.speaker: Erica
utterance.content: I know.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: You don't mind me touching your belly, do you?

utterance.speaker: Erica
utterance.content: No, I don't mind you touching my belly, but right now your hand is kind of blocking the part where the baby is gonna come out.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Erica
utterance.content: Hi.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey Erica, welcome back to town! Wow, look how big you've gotten.

utterance.speaker: Erica
utterance.content: That's because I'm pregnant!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Right, no, I understand.

utterance.speaker: Erica
utterance.content: Oh, ok. I'm just always afraid that people think I'm just fat with big breasts.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No, no, I knew .

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: She brought them up! I didn't realize you were coming back so soon!

utterance.speaker: Erica
utterance.content: Hey, well, in a couple of weeks I won't be able to travel.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yeah, and I wanted her to get to know the doctors and get settled into the hotel.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hotel? Why isn't she staying with you guys?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Because we're moving in a couple of days and it just didn't make sense.

utterance.speaker: Erica
utterance.content: Plus hotels are fun! My room has this little fridge full of free snacks!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Erica, those things aren't free. In fact they have one of the highest mark-ups of any consumer product...

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Ross! She's giving us her baby. She can eat you if she wants.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh man, I can't believe you guys are leaving this place.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh, I know. I know. Hey, you know, you can take it if you want! The lease is still in Nana's name.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No, no. This will always be your place. It would be too sad. Plus, how much a month does it cost to feed Joey?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yeah, it takes two incomes.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey, is Chandler here? We talked about catching a movie.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh, no. He doesn't have time for that. But if you want, you can go help him and Joey pack up the guest room.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Mhm, packing - sexy cheerleader comedy.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Mhm, helpful brother - creepy loner at teen movie.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What are you guys doing?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Try it, I can't feel a thing!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: We're taking a break!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: From?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Jumping on the bed?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: All right, Rachel's party is in a couple of hours and there's a lot to do. Now, Ross, you got Geller blood, you're in charge of these yahoos!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: You got it! . All right, she's right, we gotta get serious. Let's put styrofoam peanuts down his pants and kick him!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: No, no, no, guys. She's right. We should get to work. I'll take stuff out of the closet, Joey you pack 'em and Ross you re-pack whatever Joey packs.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: You guys hear a ringing?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: What the hell is this?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey! Handcuffs! And fur line, nice! I didn't know you guys had it in ya!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Chandler, you don't have a sister so you can't understand how much this bums me out.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I didn't know Monica had these!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Mhm, maybe she used them with another boyfriend. Maybe Richard!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Why would she use them with Richard and not me? I can be kinky! I once did a naked dance for her... with scarves!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Bumming hard, guys, bumming hard.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hey! Where's Mike?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, he has a gig. I kinda like being married to a rock star, you know. My husband has a gig.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah? Yeah, where is it?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, he's playing organ for a children's roller-skating party.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Rock on!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Well, I thought this would be a great opportunity to use up all the food that I don't want to move to the new house with me! So, enjoy: smoke oyster casserole with a breakfast cereal crust, kidney beans in their own juices, and for dessert, a questionable orange.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hey.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey, where's Rach?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh, she's putting Emma down, she'll be over in a second.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Great.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Now it just hit her that she's leaving and she's kind of emotional so no one say anything to set her off, ok?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Everybody
utterance.content: Hey Rach, hey you.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Here she is!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: What did I just say?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: No, no, no. It's ok. I'm gonna be fine.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Come here, I'll make you a drink.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh, man! I can't believe she's actually leaving. How am I gonna say goodbye to Rachel?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I know, she's been such a big part of my life. And it feels like when Melrose Place got cancelled. I mean... oh, forget it. I miss Melrose Place!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Who loses fifty seven coin tosses in a row? Head she wins, tails I lose. Wait a minute...

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yes, Joe?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I forgot to pick up my dry cleaning!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well, I've been better.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Uh-hmm.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: You guys are gonna come and visit me, right?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yes! You know, in six months the Statute of Limitations runs out and I can travel internationally again!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I'm gonna miss you so much.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I know.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: You know what? Uhm, I have some goodbye stuff that I wanted to say to each of you and I was gonna save it until the end of the night, but come here .

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey, what do you think they're doing in there?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Huh, if I had to guess I'd say Rachel is putting on the bubble wrap and Phoebe is doing the punching.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, Pheebs, I don't even know where to start.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Ok well, before you do, I know we weren't supposed to get you going away presents, but I do have something for you.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, oh. . What is this?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: It's a cotton swab with a bit of my saliva on it, so that if they perfect the cloning process while you are over there, you can use the DNA to create your own Pheebs!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I'm gonna throw this away, but thank you so much for the gesture!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Chandler? I was just in our bedroom and I found these on my pillow.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh, yes. I decided to leave these out for you in case Richard stops by and you wanna engage on a little light bondage and moustache play!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What are you talking about? These aren't mine.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh yeah, right! Good luck getting another scarf dance from me!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: That would be a terrible punishment. But, I'm serious, I've never seen these before.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Really? Then what are they doing in our guestroom?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Rachel used to live in that room.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Rachel... with handcuffs! Interesting!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Joey's bare ass!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: . Well played.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I love you Phoebe.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I love you too. Please don't... Don't turn into... you know... French bitch!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: All right. Well, if I gonna do this, I'd better keep going.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Ok.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ok. Monica?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yeah?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Can you come here with me for a minute?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Sure.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Are you wearing waterproof mascara?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: No.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, you're so screwed.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey. What was that all about?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: She's gonna say goodbye to each of us individually.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Are you kidding? Oh my God...

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah, I know, it's gonna be even worse for you... God... Ross, get ready to do some serious crying.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh, man, I'm not going to be able to handle this. Now I know how my students feel at the end of each year. And why they act out by giving me such bad evaluations.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Mon... Okay... I've gotta... just say what it is I'm gonna say... None of the amazing things that have happened to me in the last ten years, would have happened if it wasn't for you. No-one has been more like a sister to me...

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I know what you mean. You're like a sister to me too.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I wouldn't know what I'm gonna do without you...

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: You're the best friend I ever had.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: That is so sweet.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh no, she took down Monica... And I'm the crier in the family. Oh God! I could be next. Maybe she won't talk with me if it looks like we're deep in converstation. Oh, so that thing you said about the thing. It really made me think about that other thing.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Uh, Rach?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Well it's okay. Chandler is talking to her.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I really made you think about that thing uh?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Uh, Rach... I think I have something that belongs to you.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, I'm sure gonna miss pretending to laugh at your weird jokes that I don't get.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: No, no, no... They're really yours. We... found them in your old room.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well, these aren't mine. Maybe Monica used to use them with...

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Don't say Richard! Well, if they're not Monica's and they're not yours, then whose are they?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well, I think you're forgetting the kinkiest former resident of that room.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Pheebs!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I think these are yours.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: These are not mine... Look how flimsy they are, come on! Good God! You try to hang a guy from a waterpipe with these, they'll snap like a piece of licorice.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Can I talk to you alone for a minute?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Sure. You don't really handcuff guys to waterpipes do you?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Where do you think Mike really is?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh honey...

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Let me just say something... Because once we get into this, I'm gonna get all uncomfortable and probably make some stupid joke... I just want to say that I... I love you... And, I'm gonna miss you. And I'm so sad that you're leaving.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, you know what? Let's not say anything else. I love you.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Ooh, not so tight... I'm sorry, just give me one more chance.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay. Oh...

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I'm sor... Just go. Just go. I can't, I can't.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: So, I guess you're next. You're ready?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I don't think so.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh, you're definately not. I haven't cried like that in years.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: You cried yesterday at the six o'clock news.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: That old woman was being scammed by her mechanic.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: God! I can't believe she saved me for last. Why are they taking so long?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I don't know. But, God, Joey seems to be handling it suprisingly well.

utterance.speaker: All
utterance.content: No, no, no, no!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Okay, here we go...

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh... Well...

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah...

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I think I'm gonna take off.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Huh?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, you guys. This was an amazing night. Thank you so much. I love you. Good night.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What? I don't get a goodbye?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Lucky bastard!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Unbelievable. She says goodbye to everyone but me.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Well, maybe she thought that with all of your history it could be, you know, implicit.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Well, it needs to be plicit.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: All right, let's think about this. I mean, there's got to be an explanation. Uh... did you do anything to make her mad?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No, I don't think so.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: You know, maybe she was just really spent from our talk. It was pretty intense.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yeah. Mine too.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Mine was a humdinger

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: O-kay... I mean, don't I deserve anything? I mean, a few tears, a cursory hug? NOT FROM YOU!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Ross, if you're this upset, you should go and talk to her.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: And say what? "You owe me a goodbye",

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: THE HELL I DO!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I don't get a goodbye?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Everyone gets a goodbye but me? What have I got to do to get a goodbye, huh? Be best friends with you? Uh, go out with you? Have a baby with you? Oh wait a minute, wait a minute, I did all those things.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ross...

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh no, maybe it's me, I'm just not giving you enough credit. Uh, I mean it is difficult to say goodbye to five people. Uh, goodbye, goodbye, goodbye, goodbye, good... IT'S PHYSICALLY IMPOSSIBLE. You know what? After all we've been through, I can't believe this is how you want to leave things between us. Have a, have a good time in Paris.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I hope Ross isn't too upset.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I'm sure he's not more bummed out than I am.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Tell me about it.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well, you can't say we don't know how to throw a party.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: All right, I think I'm gonna head out.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Uh, where do you think you're going?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I thought I was going home to go to bed, but I'm sensing there's something less fun for me to do here.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: We're moving in a couple of days and we've got a lot of packing to do. It would be great if you guys could pitch in.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Joey and I can finish up in the guest room.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh, yeah, yeah, good idea.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh no! You and Phoebe are gonna help me in here.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: You couldn't be cool.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Okay, we're gonna start in the kitchen. Plates get put into plate protectors and stacked ten to a box. The silverware gets bundled in rubber bands and then bubble wrapped. Got it?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe and Joey
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Good! Now I need you to be careful and efficient. And remember, if I am harsh with you, it is only because you are doing it wrong.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hey Mon, I think I figured out whose handcuffs they are.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: You did? How?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well, I was cleaning out the closet and I found some pictures of them... being used.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh my God! Let me see.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Who's that dirty old lady?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Monica's grandmother.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Nana liked it rough!

utterance.speaker: Erica
utterance.content: Hi!

utterance.speaker: All
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Come on here, have a seat.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: How was your night?

utterance.speaker: Erica
utterance.content: Oh, it was okay. I went to a movie with my cousin and then out for dinner. We went to this place that had... Ooh... Hoo... ooh... Anyway, they had these really amazing cheeseburgers.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Erica, are you okay?

utterance.speaker: Erica
utterance.content: Yeah, you know, maybe I ate too much. I keep getting these stomach aches. They come and go like every few minutes.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh my God!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Relax! We just get her some antacids.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: She doesn't have a stomach ache, she's in labor.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh my God!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah, you got to get to the hospital.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: All right, Chandler get the coats. Erica let's go. Phoebe and Joey, keep packing! Oh my God we're gonna have a baby. All right. We're gonna have a baby! OH MY GOD, WE'RE GONNA HAVE A BABY! Oh God, oh God, I got to sit down, I got to sit down. Ooh!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Honey, it's gonna be okay.

utterance.speaker: Erica
utterance.content: You can do this. Just breathe.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Okay, okay... Okay, I feel a little better.

utterance.speaker: Erica
utterance.content: Ooh! Are you sure?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh... Yes, I'm sure. Oh honey, let's go. Okay bye everyone.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Chandler, wait, wait, wait...

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: If you get a second, find out where she got that cheeseburger.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: You really think I didn't say goodbye to you because I don't care?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: That's what it seemed like.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I cannot believe that after ten years, you do not know ONE thing about me.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Fine, then why didn't you say something?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Because it is too damn hard Ross. I can't even begin to explain to you how much I'm gonna miss you. When I think about not seeing you every day, it makes me not want to go... Okay, so if you think that I didn't say goodbye to you because you don't mean as much to me as everybody else, you're wrong. It's because you mean more to me. So there, all right, there's your goodbye... Oh!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Rach!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: You keep, you keep... You can't...

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: WHAT?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: A little more.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: A little more, a little more. A little more... All right. Okay, all right, let's do this.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: All right, ready?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah. All right, now give me your best shot.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: All right, here it goes...

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Doesn't work...
